title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Drain pasta, add to pancetta, remove from heat, and stir in egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
